title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, list models with a simple Python client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: use local models as LLMs, chat, embed or rerank inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion agent for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Vercel template for building RAG apps backed by Ollama embeddings and Next.js.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings Ollama chat and code generation directly into the editor.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible routes on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that lets groups chat with any Ollama model privately or in groups.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dock
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Weaviate, qDrant, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-chat-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a chat pane powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official curated library of Modelfile recipes (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.).

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama news, model sharing, troubleshooting and feature requests.
